oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Subvarieties of the variety of meadows
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bergstra, Jan A.
Bethke, Inge
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Rings and Algebras
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Meadows - commutative rings equipped with a total inversion operation - can be axiomatized by purely equational means. We study subvarieties of the variety of meadows obtained by extending the equational theory and expanding the signature.
